channel.title: Physics on R blog by Jordan
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on R blog by Jordan

item.title: Solving a differential equation numerically with R
item.description: Today I am going to code a function that solves an ordinary differential equation numerically. The system I will be looking at is a pendulum. The pendulum with have a length equal to l, and a position of the pendulum can be described is l* theta. Theta is the angle of the string away from the vertical axis. First I am going to add variables for physical constants m <- 3 #Mass g <- 9.
